thread.title: ​Melt Off Fat With This Scorching Tabata Workout
thread.title_full: ​Melt Off Fat With This Scorching Tabata Workout

author: jnosek1
title: ​Melt Off Fat With This Scorching Tabata Workout
text:
The explosive and quick nature of the exercises compounds the conditioning aspect of this workout, meaning there is no escaping the heart and muscle pump you'll get from this Tabata. 
Directions: Perform the exercises listed below for 20 seconds each, resting for 10 seconds after both moves. 
1a. Jump rope 
1b. Kettlebell jump squat to kneel 
That's 1 round. Perform 4 rounds. Rest 1 minute before moving to the next pair. Then perform the next two exercises listed below for 20 seconds each, resting for 10 seconds after both moves. 
2a. Kettlebell swing 
2b. Kettlebell russian twists 
That's 1 round. Perform 4 rounds. Rest 1 minute before moving to the next pair. Then perform the next two exercises listed below for 20 seconds each, resting for 10 seconds after both moves. 
3a. Crab kick 
3b. Kettlebell pull and press 
That's 1 round. Perform 4 rounds. Rest 1 minute before moving to the next pair. Then perform the next two exercises listed below for 20 seconds each, resting for 10 seconds after both moves. 
4a. Breakdancers
